summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1381, for the improvement of Lee Street, from Highland Place to 4th Avenue North; 3rd Avenue North, from the north line of Woodward's Addition to the City of Seattle, to Galer Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading, sidewalking and curbing the same; under Ordinance No. 15111 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
